displayName: Ensure AWS S3 buckets do not allow principal * and action *
rationale: Amazon S3 buckets should never include policies that contain the effect 'Allow', Principal of '*', and Action of '*'. AWS Security Best Practices explain AWS Bucket Policies and how their use affects access.
recommended_action:
1. Login to AWS Management Console and open the Amazon S3 console using https://console.aws.amazon.com/s3/ 
2. Select the Check box next to the Bucket. 
3. Open the permissions tab. 
4.Review, edit or delete the bucket policy which as Effect:Allow, Principal: *, Action: *.
 For more information, visit https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/userguide/access-policy-language-overview.html
error_message: S3 bucket policy allows all actions from all principals
ruleNames: Ensure AWS S3 Bucket Policy does not enable access for all principals, actions and services.
